snippet.title: Discolored 2 | Out now on Steam!
snippet.description:
Discolored 2 is out now on Steam! ❤️‍💚💙
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1859720/Discolored_2/

The game is also playable on the Steam Deck and is currently being ported to the Nintendo Switch, but no firm date on when that will come out. Other console ports will be announced later.

The soundtrack for the game is also available with nearly an hour and a half of music! This includes a few bonus tracks that were made for the game, but didn't make the final cut. Even though they aren't in the final game they were too good to leave off the soundtrack. There's an extra discount if you get the bundle with the soundtrack.🎵

One last request, after you finish the game please consider leaving a review as the Steam algorithm favors games with a high review count, especially games that get reviews early after release. 😉

Thank you for your support these past four years! I hope you enjoy Discolored 2! ❤️‍💚💙

Jason
